title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 400 - Installation Of House Service Equipment, Operating Conditions, And Testing Of Meters And Of Steam Quality By Corporations Having 1,000 Installed Custom
